summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons count sheets, inmate rosters, and official out-count forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 4-5, 2019. It records inmate population counts by housing unit and lists specific inmates, including one on suicide watch. The documents are routine administrative records from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: These are routine administrative count and roster documents from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for August 4-5, 2019.
The inmate population at MCC New York was recorded as 762 during these counts.
Inmate 'Leon-Maal' (Reg # 18028-104) was listed on a hospital/suicide watch roster on August 4, 2019.
Inmate 'Gama-Pineda' (Reg # 85918-054) was listed on a hospital/suicide watch roster on August 5, 2019.
The documents show standard prison procedures for tracking inmate location and status, including 'out-counts' for inmates away from their housing units.
